繠字的基本解释

繠
ruǐ
下垂的样子：“佩玉繠兮，余无所系之。”
聚。
茸。
古同“蕊”，花蕊。

繠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruǐ］
［《廣韻》如壘切，上旨，日。］
［《廣韻》如累切，上紙，日。］
(1)下垂貌。
(2)通“蘂”。花蕊。

繠字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繠； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页939第17
【廣韻】如壘切【集韻】【韻會】乳棰切【正韻】如累切，?音蘂。【廣韻】茸也，垂也。又佩垂貌。【左傳·哀十三年】吳申叔儀乞糧于公孫有山氏，曰：佩玉繠兮，余無所繫之。【註】繠然服飾備也。　又【集韻】汝垂切。義同。

繠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
繠字的起名意思

暂无。

dangle
Basic explanation of words
dangle
ruǐ
The drooping look: "I have nothing to do with it."
Poly.
Velvet.
The ancient same "stamen", flower stamen.
dangle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ruǐ］
["Guangyun" is like base cutting, decree, day. ]
["Guangyun" is cut like tired, on paper, day. ]
(1) Drooping appearance.
(2) Through "Rui". Stamens.

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　繠; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 939 17
[Guang Yun] Ru Lei cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ruchu cut [Zheng Yun] Ru tired cut,? Yin core. [Guang Yun] Rong Ye, Chui Ye. Pei Chui looks again. [Zuo Zhuan·Thirteen Years of Amour] Wu Shenshuyi begs for food from Gongsun Youshan clan, saying: Pei Yuyunxi, there is nothing left. [Note] Suran clothing is also available.　[Jiyun] Ru cut down. The same meaning.
